plot: Koduku Diddina Kapuram is produced and directed by Krishna himself. The film has Mahesh Babu in a dual role. Krishna and Vijayashanthi are happily married couple...
title: Koduku Diddina Kapuram
plot_es: Koduku Diddina Kapuram is produced and directed by Krishna himself. The film has Mahesh Babu in a dual role. Krishna and Vijayashanthi are happily married couple...
plot_en: Koduku Diddina Kapuram is produced and directed by Krishna himself. The film has Mahesh Babu in a dual role. Krishna and Vijayashanthi are happily married couple...
